alert.note: Alert for Posey; Vanderburgh (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:03PM EDT until July 02 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Vanderburgh County in southwestern Indiana... East central Posey County in southwestern Indiana... Northern Henderson County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 202 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Vernon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Spotters reported Quarter sized hail in New Haven, IL. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Evansville, Henderson, Mount Vernon, Newburgh, Melody Hill, Darmstadt and Kasson. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 5, and between Mile Markers 8 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
